name: Up And Down (itch) (bartexwhy)
description:
I made this game for CWC: Game Jam 2021. Theme of this game jam was "Modernizing a Classic" so I blended some Pacmam gameplay (collecting something, for my game these are orbs) and some Mario platforming gameplay. All the assets were made by me in Aseprite, sound effects were made in software called sfxr.

This version of a game is fixed, you can play the original version here: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/up-and-down-1 Controls

A, D - move left and right 

R - restart level 

Spacebar - jump (you can double jump) 

LMB (Left Mouse Button) - attack

TAB - pause game

Installation
  • Download your version of choice
  • Unpack .zip file 
  • For Windows: Run .exe file
  • For Linux: Run .x86_64 file as an executable (go to properties and then check the that says about executing this file as a program)
  • Enjoy!

I would be very grateful to hear your opinion of this game.

If want to see source code of this game then click here:
